    1: import argparse
    2: 
    3: from pip._vendor.certifi import contents, where
    4: 
    5: parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
    6: parser.add_argument("-c", "--contents", action="store_true")
    7: args = parser.parse_args()
    8: 
    9: if args.contents:
   10:     print(contents())
   11: else:
   12:     print(where())
